name: popoverNotifications
title: open notifications in popover view
description: allows viewing notifications from the dashboard

numFetch.name: number of notifications to display
numFetch.tooltip: the number of notifications displayed. larger numbers will take longer to load.

highlightUnread.name: highlight unread notifs
highlightUnread.tooltip: highlights new notifications recieved since the last time the notifications were viewed

showTags.name: show tags on shares
showTags.tooltip: creates unique notifications for shares with tags and displays the added tags
